answers.answer: I love dominos , there thin crust is deelishh !,It's fine .
Lol pregnancy is my excuse to eat what ever I want heck half the time I wake up in the morning craving a Pepsi float ...yummmm
Hahaha, I will definitely order one now.
Eat an extra slice for me! Gestational diabetes is NOT fun... :(
I crave pizza alot even thou my doctor told me not to eat to much chunk. But I can't help it lol
Imo pizza is very healthy unless you need to limit ur carb intake or something.  I can't eat it having gestational diabetes :(  You r lucky, if ur not worried about calories eat up.
Pizza is probably fine in moderation! Just like practically everything else in pregnancy!
I was worried about the cheese but now i can eat freely.
Lol send me two slices in the mail !  Pizza sounds good right now

question: Is it okay to grab a pizza from Domino's, I am craving pizzas although I have kept a good diet.I also love this app because I see many questions and answers amaze me.Advice needed. Thanks.
title: Pizza
